item.title: 采购经理人指数显示，欧元区 4 月份工厂活动转差
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，欧元区制造业活动的持续低迷在4月份有所加深，原因是尽管工厂纷纷降价，但需求仍在萎缩，促使企业再次裁员。【原文：The ongoing downturn in euro zone manufacturing activity deepened in April due to crumbling demand despite factories cutting prices, pushing firms to reduce headcount again, a survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 法国航空公司、布鲁塞尔航空公司等航空公司被欧盟列入 "绿色清洗 "调查名单
item.description: 法国航空公司（Air France）和布鲁塞尔航空公司（Brussels Airlines）向路透社证实了比利时广播公司 RTBF 的报道，这两家航空公司是欧盟正在调查的 20 家航空公司之一，因为它们可能存在误导性的 "绿化 "行为。【原文：Air France and Brussels Airlines are among 20 airlines being investigated by the European Union for potentially misleading greenwashing practices, the airlines told Reuters, confirming a report by Belgian broadcaster RTBF.】

item.title: 欧股开盘在盈利潮和美联储结果的影响下下滑
item.description: 周四，欧洲股市开盘后走势低迷，因为投资者在周中假期结束后重返市场，分析一系列大单财报，以及美联储推迟降息的信号。【原文：European shares opened on a sombre note on Thursday as investors returned after a mid-week holiday to parse a slew of big-ticket earnings and the Federal Reserve signalling a delay in interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 环球音乐集团与 TikTok 达成新的授权协议
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）和 TikTok 周四表示，双方已达成一项新的授权协议，该协议将使环球音乐集团的歌曲和艺人重新登陆社交媒体平台。【原文：Universal Music Group and TikTok said on Thursday that they had reached a new licensing agreement that will restore the label's songs and artists to the social media platform.】

item.title: 解说员：日本最近疑似干预日元的策略是什么？
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率飙升，交易商认为这是日本当局为阻止日元大幅下跌而采取的又一轮干预措施。【原文：The yen surged against the dollar on what traders suspect was another round of intervention by Japanese authorities to stem the currency's sharp declines.】

item.title: 美国经济表现出色，经合组织上调全球经济增长展望
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）周四表示，得益于美国经济活动的恢复性增长，全球经济增长速度超过了几个月前的预期，而通胀正以比预期更快的速度向各国央行的目标靠拢，该组织上调了对全球经济的展望。【原文：The global economy is growing faster than expected only a few months ago thanks to resilient U.S. activity while inflation is converging more quickly than expected with central banks' targets, the OECD said on Thursday, upgrading its outlook.】

item.title: 俄罗斯法院取消扣押摩根大通银行与俄罗斯 VTB 纠纷中的部分资金
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件，在与俄罗斯国有银行 VTB 的纠纷中，俄罗斯法院取消了扣押摩根大通在俄罗斯的部分资金的决定。【原文：A Russian court cancelled the seizure of part of JPMorgan Chase's funds in Russia in a dispute with Russian state-owned bank VTB , according to a court document.】

item.title: 日本 3 月家庭支出可能加速下滑
item.description: 路透社周四的一项民意调查显示，日本家庭支出可能在3月份加快了下降步伐，这凸显了渴望实现自我维持经济增长和货币政策正常化的决策者所面临的困难。【原文：Japanese household spending probably accelerated its pace of declines in March, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, underscoring the difficulties facing policymakers keen to engineer self-sustaining economic growth and normalise monetary policy.】

item.title: 马士基第一季度利润超预期，上调财政年度指导区间下限
item.description: 航运集团马士基周四公布的第一季度盈利高于预期，并上调了全年利润指导区间的下限，这主要得益于需求增长和将船只调离红海。【原文：Shipping group Maersk on Thursday reported first-quarter earnings above expectations and lifted the lower end of its full-year profit guidance range, supported by higher demand and the diverting of vessels away from the Red Sea.】

item.title: 壳牌第一季度盈利 77 亿美元，超出预期
item.description: 壳牌周四公布的第一季度调整后收益为 77 亿美元，大幅超出预期，原因是石油交易强劲，炼油利润率提高。【原文：Shell on Thursday reported first-quarter adjusted earnings of $7.7 billion, sharply beating expectations, on the back of strong oil trading and higher refining margins.】

item.title: 日本住友商事净利润下降 32%，低于预期
item.description: 日本贸易公司住友商事（Sumitomo Corp）报告称，截至 3 月份的财年净利润为 3,864 亿日元（合 25 亿美元），同比下降 31.7%，低于预期。【原文：Japanese trading house Sumitomo Corp reported net profit for the fiscal year ended in March fell 31.7% from a year earlier to 386.4 billion yen ($2.5 billion), missing estimates.】

item.title: 肥胖症药物制造商诺和诺德上调业绩展望，第一季度利润超预期
item.description: 诺和诺德公司周四上调了 2024 年的业绩展望，该公司公布的第一季度营业利润高于分析师的预测。【原文：Novo Nordisk raised its 2024 outlook on Thursday as it posted first-quarter operating profit above analyst forecasts.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔第一季度利润超预期
item.description: 世界第二大钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔公司周四公布的第一季度核心盈利超出预期，此前该公司在北美、巴西、欧洲和印度的业绩均有所改善。【原文：ArcelorMittal , the world's second-largest steelmaker, reported on Thursday first-quarter core earnings above expectations after improved results in North America, Brazil, Europe and India.】

item.title: 鲍威尔的安抚语气可能不足以应对通胀引发的市场恐慌
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在央行货币政策会议后发出的安抚信息可能无法安抚焦躁不安的美国股市和债券投资者，因为通胀路径的不确定性加剧了人们对即将公布的数据的关注。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell's reassuring message following the central bank’s monetary policy meeting may not calm frazzled U.S. stock and bond investors, as uncertainty over the path of inflation intensifies the focus on upcoming data.】

item.title: 上午竞标：干预、冲洗、重复
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 汇丰银行将香港最优惠贷款利率维持在 5.875% 不变
item.description: 汇丰控股（HSBC Holdings）周四表示，在香港事实上的中央银行维持隔夜贴现窗口的基准利率不变，追随美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）维持利率稳定的决定后，汇丰将其在香港的最优惠贷款利率维持在 5.875%。【原文：HSBC Holdings said on Thursday it had kept its best lending rate in Hong Kong at 5.875%, after the city's de facto central bank kept unchanged the base rate charged through its overnight discount window, tracking the U.S. Federal Reserve's decision to keep rates steady.】

item.title: 渣打银行第一季度利润增长 5.5%，超出预期
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered PLC）周四公布，其第一季度税前利润增长了 5.5%，超过了预期，原因是利率上升促进了这家专注于新兴市场的银行的盈利。【原文：Standard Chartered PLC posted on Thursday a 5.5% rise in its first-quarter pretax profit, beating estimates, as higher interest rates bolstered earnings at the emerging markets-focused lender.】

item.title: 香港央行维持关键利率不变，追踪美联储动向
item.description: 香港金融管理局（金管局）周四将通过隔夜贴现窗口收取的基准利率维持在5.75%不变，追随美国联邦储备委员会维持利率稳定的举措。【原文：The Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) kept its base rate charged through the overnight discount window unchanged at 5.75% on Thursday, tracking a move by the U.S. Federal Reserve to keep rates steady.】

item.title: 前官员称日本外汇干预预示着 160 日元的底线
item.description: 哥伦比亚大学学者、前财政部高管伊藤隆敏（Takatoshi Ito）周四告诉路透社记者，日本当局干预汇市很可能是为了发出信号，表明他们认为160日元兑1美元是他们的底线。【原文：Japanese authorities likely intervened in the currency market to signal they see 160 yen to the dollar as their line in the sand, Columbia University academic and former finance ministry executive Takatoshi Ito told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 疑似干预导致日元对美元汇率大涨后回落
item.description: 日元在周四早盘回落，在隔夜兑美元汇率突然飙升后逆转了方向，交易员和分析师很快将此归因于日本当局的干预。【原文：The yen gave up ground in early trade on Thursday, reversing direction after a sudden surge against the dollar overnight that traders and analysts were quick to attribute to intervention by Japanese authorities.】

item.title: 油价因美国有望补充战略储备而回升
item.description: 周四，油价因美国可能开始购买原油作为石油储备的前景而上涨，此前油价曾因以色列-加沙停火的希望、对美国降息的疑虑以及石油库存膨胀而跌至七周低点。【原文：Oil prices rose on Thursday on the prospect the U.S. may start buying crude for its petroleum reserve, after prices sank to a seven-week low on hopes for an Israel-Gaza ceasefire, doubts about U.S. interest rate cuts and swelling oil inventories.】

item.title: 韩国 4 月工厂活动萎缩，但对前景的乐观情绪回升
item.description: 周四的一项私营部门调查显示，韩国 4 月份的工厂活动再次萎缩，但制造商的乐观情绪攀升至近两年来的最高水平，原因是产量和订单都出现了小幅增长。【原文：South Korea's factory activity contracted again in April, but manufacturers' optimism climbed to the highest level in nearly two years as output and orders managed to post marginal growth, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 拜耳公司的孟山都公司在华盛顿法院赢得了对 1.85 亿美元多氯联苯判决的撤销权
item.description: 华盛顿州一家上诉法院周三推翻了拜耳旗下孟山都公司因西雅图地区一所学校的化学污染问题而被判赔偿 1.85 亿美元的判决，这是孟山都公司在几周内赢得的第二场重大官司。【原文：A Washington state appeals court on Wednesday overturned a $185 million verdict against Bayer's Monsanto unit over chemical contamination at a Seattle-area school, marking the second big legal win for the company in as many weeks.】

item.title: 降息推迟，亚洲股市震荡；日元飙升
item.description: 在美联储宣布推迟降息后，周四亚洲股市开局不稳，而美元则因日元大幅下跌，交易员认为这是日本的干预。【原文：Asian stocks got off to a shaky start on Thursday after the Federal Reserve flagged delays to interest rate cuts, while the dollar fell heavily on the yen in what traders reckoned was Japanese intervention.】

item.title: 韩国 4 月消费者通胀率降至 2.9
item.description: 韩国官方数据周四显示，韩国4月份消费者通胀率三个月来首次下降，低于经济学家的预期，支持了市场对韩国下半年放松货币政策的预期。【原文：South Korea's consumer inflation eased in April for the first time in three months, official data showed on Thursday, coming in lower than economists' estimates and supporting market expectations for monetary easing in the latter half of the year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯第三季度销售额增长，消费者情绪谨慎
item.description: 周四，澳大利亚伍尔沃斯公司（Woolworths）公布第三季度销售额增长，食品零售部门的业绩改善推动了销售额的增长，但该公司警告称，尽管通胀有所缓和，但消费者仍将保持谨慎。【原文：Australia's Woolworths reported a rise in third-quarter sales on Thursday, boosted by an improving performance in the food retail segment, but warned of continued consumer caution despite moderating inflation.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第一季度净利润同比增长 15%，创历史新高
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团周四公布，在总收入强劲增长的推动下，第一季度净利润同比增长15%，达到29.6亿新元（21.8亿美元），创历史新高。【原文：DBS Group , Singapore's biggest bank, posted on Thursday a 15% rise in net profit in the first quarter to a record high of S$2.96 billion ($2.18 billion) from a year earlier, driven by strong total income growth.】

item.title: 赌场运营商米高梅澳门业务强劲，第一季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 美高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts International）周三公布的第一季度业绩超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其中国业务的强劲表现，该赌场运营商继续受益于疫情后入境限制的放宽。【原文：MGM Resorts International beat first-quarter Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, driven by strength in its China operations as the casino operator continues to benefit from easing post-pandemic entry restrictions.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行上半年现金收益下降 13
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank）周四公布的上半年现金利润下降了约 13%，因为这家澳大利亚排名第二的银行正在努力应对高昂的运营成本和残酷的竞争。澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank）周四公布的上半年现金利润下降了约 13%，原因是该国排名第二的贷款机构正在努力应对高昂的运营成本和残酷的竞争。【原文：National Australia Bank on Thursday posted an about 13% drop in its first-half cash profit as the country's no. 2 lender grappled with high operating costs and cutthroat competition.】

item.title: 由于客户支出稳定，Cognizant 第一季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受客户稳定支出的帮助，Cognizant Technology Solutions 周三公布的第一季度营收超出华尔街预期，使其股价在盘后交易中上涨超过 4%。【原文：Cognizant Technology Solutions beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue on Wednesday, helped by steady spending by clients, sending its shares up more than 4% in aftermarket trading.】
